QuestData.Title: Refining Ego
QuestData.Description:
I will locate Phaestus. In the meantime, task for you!
The Forsworn use my forge to make their centurion army. Their vile intentions warp the metals we use!
Destroy their centurions, take their parts. Smelt them down in the forge to purify the metals, then return to me.
I need much metal for my plan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Purified Metal by collecting Tainted Centurion Components from centurion units and smelting them down at the Eternal Forge.
